meanings.definition: A colorless, strong-smelling gas used in making resins and plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers wore masks to protect themselves from the formaldehyde fumes.
meanings.sent2: The formaldehyde was mixed with other chemicals to create a new type of plastic.
meanings.sent3: The formaldehyde gas was so stinky that even the skunks complained!
meanings.sent4: The formaldehyde hung in the air like a ghostly presence, reminding everyone of its potent smell.
meanings.sent5: The formaldehyde odor was so strong, it lingered in your nostrils long after leaving the factory.

meanings.definition: A solution of formaldehyde in water, used as a disinfectant or to preserve biological specimens.
meanings.sent1: The lab technician prepared a formaldehyde solution to preserve the frog for dissection.
meanings.sent2: The formaldehyde solution effectively killed off any harmful bacteria on the medical equipment.
meanings.sent3: The formaldehyde solution turned the lab into a strange-smelling science experiment!
meanings.sent4: The formaldehyde solution acted like a protective shield, keeping the specimen intact for years.
meanings.sent5: The formaldehyde solution shimmered under the lights, preserving the delicate butterfly wings perfectly.
